text: Hungary will competes at the 2007 World Championships in Athletics with 11 athletes. == Competitors == {| |valign=top| ===Men=== 50 km walk: Zoltán Czukor Shot put: Lajos Kürthy Discus: Zoltán Kővágó, Gábor Máté Hammer throw: Krisztián Pars Javelin throw: Csongor Olteán Decathlon: Attila Zsivoczky |valign=top| ===Women=== 400 m: Barbara Petráhn 100 m Hurdles: Edit Vári High jump: Dóra Győrffy Hammer throw: Katalin Divós |} ==References== Category:Nations at the 2007 World Championships in Athletics World Championships in Athletics Category:Hungary at the World Championships in Athletics
title: Hungary at the 2007 World Championships in Athletics
